title: Enchant Lightning
description: Enchants the target's weapon adding [20% Spell Power] lightning damage to attacks for 3 turns.

title: Shock
description: Reaches out and shocks the target dealing 60% Spell Power as lightning damage. Applies Disabled to the target.

title: Dazzling Darts
description: Shoots 3 darts of electricity each dealing 30% Spell Power as lightning damage.

title: Storm Weathered I
description: Increases all Elemental Resistences by 5%

title: Stormbringer I
description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 5%

title: Thunder Borne
description: Increases Lightning Resistance by 15%

title: Lightning Shield
description: Increases Elemental Resistance by 20%. Attackers take 15% Spell Power as lightning damage for 2 turns.

title: Twister
description: Summons a raging tempest that deals 120% Spell power as lightning damage in a line. Targets hit are Crippled for 2 turns. The line is 6 hexes long and 3 hexes wide.

title: Teleport Self
description: Teleports the caster to the target location in a flash of lightning.

title: Storm Weathered II
description: Increases all Elemental Resistances by 10%. This bonus adds to Storm Weathered 1 for a total of 15% Elemental Resistances.

title: Stormbringer II
description: Increases Critical Hit chance by 8%. This bonus adds to Stormbringer 1 for a total of 13% increase to Critical Hit chance.

title: Gathering Storm
description: Increases Maximum Mana by 20%.

title: Aura of Lightning
description: Each time an action is made by an enemy within the 3 hexes they suffer 40% Spell Power as lightning damage. Lasts until removed or not enough mana. Blast Radius 3.

title: Teleport Other
description: Teleports the target to the location of your choosing in a flash of lightning.

title: Thunder Bolt
description: Summon lightning from the sky to strike an area dealing 110% Spell Power as lightning damage. Blast radius 2.

title: Chain Lightning
description: Conjures a lightning bolt that chains up to 5 enemies near the target dealing 80% Spell Power as lightning damage to each target.

title: Storm Brewing
description: Each stack of Shocked you've applied increases your Critical Hit chance by 3%.

title: Energy Shield
description: 50% of the damage taken is lost in mana instead of health.

title: Static Field
description: Averages all the current health percentages of targets within 3 hexes and redistributes them to be even. Blast radius 2.

title: Overload
description: The target has all their damage duplicated as lightning damage for the current turn.

title: Shocking Shackles
description: Deals 100% Spell Power as lightning damage. Applies Stunned. This ability does not have a damage range, and thus always does the same amount of damage.

title: Thunder Storm
description: Summon a thunderstorm over a large area that deals 90% Spell Power as lightning damage every turn to enemies with it's range. Blast radius 5. Duration 2 turns. This ability does not have a damage range, and thus always does the same amount of damage.

title: Heavy Rains
description: Each point of Intelligence now grants 0.1% Critical Hit Chance and 1% Critical Hit damage.

title: Recharge
description: You have a 33% chance to completely refund the mana cost spent while using abilities. When mana is refunded this way, a random ability will have its cooldown lowered by 1.

title: Energy Cannon
description: Deals 20% Spell Power as thunder damage in a 6 hex line 10 times. The line is 6 hexes long and 3 hexes wide.

title: Thunder Wrath
description: Summons 4 thunder bolts targeting enemies at random within a 10 hex radius. Each bolt deals 100% Spell Power as lightning damage to foes within 3 hexes of its blast. This ability has no damage range and thus always does the same damage.

title: Conduit
description: Gains an additional action each turn.

title: Thunder Struck
description: Your lightning damage has a 20% chance to conjure a thunderbolt on a random enemy dealing 110% Spell Power as lightning damage within 2 hexes of its blast. This ability has no damage range and thus always does the same damage.

title: Freeze Earth
description: Freezes the ground in the target area. Enemy movement requires double movement points over frozen ground. Blast radius 2.

title: Enchant Cold
description: Enchants the target's weapon adding 20% Spell Power as cold damage to attacks, last 3 turns.

title: Chilling Strike
description: The caster's hand becomes imbued with frost thrusting it at the target dealing 120% Spell Power as cold damage.

title: Frost Shard
description: Impale your target on a shard of ice dealing 90% Spell Power as cold damage.

title: Frostbite I
description: Your stacks of Chilled now reduce the targets damage by 2%.

title: Crystalize I
description: Increases Physical Resistance by 5%.

title: Frost Borne
description: Increases Cold Resistance by 15%.

title: Deep Freeze
description: Intense frost encircles your foe applying 5 stacks of Chilled on the target, Freezing them for 1 turn.

title: Frost Armor
description: Envelopes the caster in frost granting 15% Cold Resistance and 10% Physical Resistance. Attackers take 15% Spell Power as cold damage. Lasts 2 turns.

title: Ice Lance
description: The caster hurls a razor-like shard of ice piercing foes in a line dealing 120% Spell Power as cold damage.

title: Frost Nova
description: The caster creates a wave of frozen energy dealing 100% Spell Power as cold damage within 2 hexes of the target.

title: Frostbite II
description: Your stacks of Chilled now reduce the targets damage by an additional 3% for a total of 5%.

title: Crystalize II
description: Increases Physical Resistance by an additional 10% for a total of 15%.

title: Break the Ice
description: The first time you deal damage in a battle it is increased by 100%.

title: Aura of Frost
description: Deals 40% Spell Power as cold damage to enemies that start their turns within 3 hexes of your character. Lasts until removed or not enough mana. Blast Radius 3.

title: Breath of Winter
description: Conjures the breath of a frost dragon dealing 160% Spell Power as cold damage to all enemies in a cone.

title: Ice Wall
description: Summon 3 pillars to block adjoining hexes. Lasts two turns.

title: Frozen Spikes
description: Hurl 5 shards of ice, each dealing 20% Spell power as cold damage.

title: Cold Blooded
description: Each stack of chilled you've applied increases your cold damage by 5%.

title: Diamond Ice
description: Intelligence increases the effectiveness of Armor and Magic Armor by 0.5% per point.

title: Brain Freeze
description: Deals 100% Spell Power as cold damage each time the target performs an action. Lasts for 3 turns. This ability does not have a damage range and always does the same damage.

title: Ice Storm
description: Conjure a massive ice storm dealing 90% Spell Power as cold damage to affected enemies each turn. Lasts for 2 turns. Blast radius 5. This ability does not have a damage range and always does the same damage.

title: Stasis
description: Encases the friendly target in ice and restores 30% of their maximum health. Increases All Resistances by 50%. Target is stunned for the duration. Lasts 1 turn.

title: Frostbite
description: Each stack of Chilled now reduces the target's maximum health by 5%.

title: Invulnerable Winter
description: Every stack of your Chilled applied increases your Armor and Magic Armor by 10. (Verification Needed)

title: Shatter
description: Summons a blast of frozen energy dealing 70% Spell Power as cold damage plus an additional 70% Spell Power per stack of Chilled on targets in a 4 hex radius.

title: Chain Frost
description: Deals 50% Spell Power as cold damage. Bounces up to 10 times between enemies within 4 hexes.

title: Mass Freeze
description: Applies Frozen to all enemies. Blast radius 100.

title: Master of Ice
description: Each turn you freeze an enemy, you gain an additional action.

title: Icefall
description: When enemies are frozen by you they release a Frost Nova
